products.title: DuoLight Gainsboro Grey PerfectFIT Thermal Blind
products.metadescription: Well it doesn't get much more contemporary than this. These perfectfit duolight gainsboro grey pleated blinds tick all of the boxes when it comes to modern styling.  The clever honeycomb pockets sit beautifully behind an integral frame, with a choice of colours to suit your home.
